title: Spicy Baked Shrimp
note: I got this recipe from Julie Klewer from Tucson. She was married to one of the Peds Cardiologists.
instructions: Combine first 7 ingredients in 9 x 13 baking dish. Add shrimp & toss to coat. Refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 450Â° (don't put cold glass dish in hot oven!). Bake, stirring occasionally, about 10 mins.
Serve over pasta with chopped tomatoes. Garnish with lemon wedges & parmesan cheese.
